trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento ocorre somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>está definida ou seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: Quando você processa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento, o menu de atalho que você especificar o manipulador é mostrado sempre que o usuário clica uma célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display shortcut menus determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando você deseja exibir menus de atalho, determinados pelo estado atual ou valor de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento também ocorre sempre que o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é recuperada, ou programaticamente ou quando o usuário clica na célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>Propriedades para determinar o estado ou o valor de uma célula e use essas informações para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é inicializada com o valor da célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade, que substitui o valor do evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar as penalidades de desempenho de definir a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>valor para várias células.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode especificar os menus de atalho para linhas individuais em vez de células individuais, definindo a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade ou manipulação de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: A célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>configuração da propriedade substitui a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>configuração de propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>substituições de evento de ambos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento e a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>configuração da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar `null` para um menu de atalho célula, no entanto, para impedir que um menu de atalho da linha que está sendo substituído.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The column index of cell that the event occurred for.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna da célula que o evento ocorreu para.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that the event occurred for.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que o evento ocorreu em.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the cell that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o menu de atalho para a célula que gerou o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a cell.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, essa propriedade contém o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>se ele tiver sido definido para uma célula de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
